a11.name: Archer
a11.info: Ranged unit. Strong vs. units at long range. Weak vs. Skirmishers and units at close range.

a12.name: Crossbowman
a12.info: Ranged unit. Strong vs. units at long range. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers, Mangonels, and units at close range.

a13.name: Arbalester
a13.info: Ranged unit. Strong vs. units at long range. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers, Onagers, and units at close range.

a21.name: Skirmisher
a21.info: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range.

a22.name: Elite Skirmisher
a22.info: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range.

a23.name: Imperial Skirmisher
a23.info: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range. Trainable by Vietnamese and their allies.

a31.name: Hand Cannoneer
a31.info: Gunpowder unit with powerful attack, but inaccurate at long range. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers and archers.

a41.name: Cavalry Archer
a41.info: Mounted archer. Strong vs. slow units at long range. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers and units at close range.

a42.name: Heavy Cavalry Archer
a42.info: Mounted archer. Strong vs. slow units at long range. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers and units at close range.

a51.name: Elephant Archer
a51.info: Slow and heavy mounted archer. Strong vs. archers and infantry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Camel Riders.

a52.name: Elite Elephant Archer
a52.info: Slow and heavy mounted archer. Strong vs. archers and infantry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Camel Riders.

a61.name: Genitour
a61.info: Mounted skirmisher. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range. Trainable by Berbers and their allies.

a62.name: Elite Genitour
a62.info: Mounted skirmisher. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range. Trainable by Berbers and their allies.

b11.name: Militia
b11.info: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

b12.name: Man-at-Arms
b12.info: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

b13.name: Long Swordsman
b13.info: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

b14.name: Two-Handed Swordsman
b14.info: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

b15.name: Champion
b15.info: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

b21.name: Spearman
b21.info: Anti-cavalry infantry unit. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry.

b22.name: Pikeman
b22.info: Anti-cavalry infantry unit. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry.

b23.name: Halberdier
b23.info: Anti-cavalry infantry unit. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry.

b31.name: Eagle Scout
b31.info: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks and archers. Weak vs. Long Swordsmen and cavalry.

b32.name: Eagle Warrior
b32.info: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks and archers. Weak vs. Long Swordsmen and cavalry.

b33.name: Elite Eagle Warrior
b33.info: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks and archers. Weak vs. Long Swordsmen and cavalry.

v1.name: Petard
v1.info: Demolition siege unit armed with explosives. Strong vs. buildings. Weak vs. other units. Self-destructs when used.

v2.name: Trebuchet
v2.info: Powerful anti-building siege weapon with long range. Must be packed to move, unpacked to attack. Cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. buildings. Can attack ground and destroy trees.

d1.name: Fishing Ship
d1.info: Gathers food from fish and Fish Traps. Builds Fish Traps.

d2.name: Transport Ship
d2.info: Used to move units across water. Select the units you want to transport, then right-click on the Transport Ship to board them. Use the Unload button to unload units on the shore.

d3.name: Trade Cog
d3.info: Trade unit used for generating gold at another player's Dock. To trade, click the Trade Cog then right-click another player's Dock. Will return with gold to your Dock.

d41.name: Fire Galley
d41.info: Warship that spews fire at close range. Strong vs. Galleys. Weak vs. Demolition Rafts.

d42.name: Fire Ship
d42.info: Warship that spews fire at close range. Strong vs. Galleys. Weak vs. Demolition Rafts.

d43.name: Fast Fire Ship
d43.info: Warship that spews fire at close range. Strong vs. Galleys. Weak vs. Demolition Rafts.

d51.name: Demolition Raft
d51.info: Demolition ship armed with explosives. Strong vs. Fire Galleys and buildings. Self-destructs when used.

d52.name: Demolition Ship
d52.info: Demolition ship armed with explosives. Strong vs. Fire Galleys and buildings. Self-destructs when used.

d53.name: Heavy Demolition Ship
d53.info: Demolition ship armed with explosives. Strong vs. Fire Galleys and buildings. Self-destructs when used.

d61.name: Galley
d61.info: All-purpose warship with ranged attack. Weak vs. Fire Galleys.

d62.name: War Galley
d62.info: All-purpose warship with ranged attack. Weak vs. Fire Galleys.

d63.name: Galleon
d63.info: All-purpose warship with ranged attack. Weak vs. Fire Galleys.

d71.name: Cannon Galleon
d71.info: Anti-building siege warship with long range, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. buildings. Weak vs. other units.

d72.name: Elite Cannon Galleon
d72.info: Anti-building siege warship with long range, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. buildings. Weak vs. other units.

k11.name: Battering Ram
k11.info: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks. Garrisoned infantry increase speed and attack.

k12.name: Capped Ram
k12.info: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks. Garrisoned infantry increase speed and attack.

k13.name: Siege Ram
k13.info: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks. Garrisoned infantry increase speed and attack.

k21.name: Mangonel
k21.info: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.

k22.name: Onager
k22.info: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.

k23.name: Siege Onager
k23.info: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.

k31.name: Scorpion
k31.info: Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units. Strong vs. large groups of units. Weak vs. cavalry and siege weapons.

k32.name: Heavy Scorpion
k32.info: Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units. Strong vs. large groups of units. Weak vs. cavalry and siege weapons.

k41.name: Bombard Cannon
k41.info: Siege weapon with long range. Strong vs. buildings and siege weapons. Weak vs. melee units.

k42.name: Houfnice
k42.info: Bohemian unique siege unit. Siege weapon with long range. Strong vs. buildings and siege weapons. Weak vs. melee units.

k51.name: Battle Elephant
k51.info: Slow and heavy cavalry. Strong vs. cavalry, infantry, and archers. Weak vs. Monks and Pikemen.

k52.name: Elite Battle Elephant
k52.info: Slow and heavy cavalry. Strong vs. cavalry, infantry, and archers. Weak vs. Monks and Pikemen.

k61.name: Siege Tower
k61.info: Quick land transport used to unload units over enemy walls. Resistant to archer attack. Cannot be used by mounted units.

l11.name: Scout Cavalry
l11.info: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

l12.name: Light Cavalry
l12.info: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

l13.name: Hussar
l13.info: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

l14.name: Winged Hussar
l14.info: Unique to Poles and Lithuanians. Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks and gunpowder units. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

l21.name: Knight
l21.info: Powerful all-purpose cavalry. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen, Camel Riders, and Monks.

l22.name: Cavalier
l22.info: Powerful all-purpose cavalry. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen, Camel Riders, and Monks.

l23.name: Paladin
l23.info: Powerful all-purpose cavalry. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen, Camel Riders, and Monks.

l31.name: Camel Scout
l31.info: Gurjara unique scout unit. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Monks, and archers.

l32.name: Camel Rider
l32.info: Fast anti-cavalry unit. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. Spearmen, Monks, and archers.

l33.name: Heavy Camel Rider
l33.info: Fast anti-cavalry unit. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. Spearmen, Monks, and archers.

l34.name: Imperial Camel Rider
l34.info: Indian unique anti-cavalry unit. Fast-moving. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Monks, and archers.

l41.name: Battle Elephant
l41.info: Slow and heavy cavalry. Strong vs. cavalry, infantry, and archers. Weak vs. Monks and Pikemen.

l42.name: Elite Battle Elephant
l42.info: Slow and heavy cavalry. Strong vs. cavalry, infantry, and archers. Weak vs. Monks and Pikemen.

l51.name: Steppe Lancer
l51.info: Light cavalry unit with increased attack range. Strong in groups. Weak vs. Camel Riders and archers.

l52.name: Elite Steppe Lancer
l52.info: Light cavalry unit with increased attack range. Strong in groups. Weak vs. Camel Riders and archers.

m1.name: Trade Cart
m1.info: Trade unit used for generating gold at another player's Market. To trade, click the Trade Cart then right-click another player's Market. Will return with gold to your Market.

h1.name: Villager
h1.info: Gathers resources. Builds and repairs buildings. Also repairs ships and siege weapons.

ua1.name: Slinger
ua1.info: Inca unique unit. Ranged anti-infantry unit that cannot attack at close range. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and cavalry.

ub1.name: Condottiero
ub1.info: Fast anti-gunpowder infantry. Strong vs. gunpowder units. Weak vs. cavalry and archers. Trainable by Italians and their allies.

uc1.name: Flaming Camel
uc1.info: Incendiary camel loaded with flammable hay and brush. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry. Self-destructs when used.

ud11.name: Longboat
ud11.info: Viking unique ship that fires multiple arrows. Strong vs. War Galleys, land units, and buildings.

ud12.name: Elite Longboat
ud12.info: Viking unique ship that fires multiple arrows. Strong vs. War Galleys, land units, and buildings.

ud21.name: Caravel
ud21.info: Portuguese unique ship that fires bolts that pierce multiple units. Strong vs. large groups of ships. Weak vs. Fire Ships.

ud22.name: Elite Caravel
ud22.info: Portuguese unique ship that fires bolts that pierce multiple units. Strong vs. large groups of ships. Weak vs. Fire Ships.

ud31.name: Turtle Ship
ud31.info: Korean unique ship. Slow and ironclad. Strong vs. warships and buildings.

ud32.name: Elite Turtle Ship
ud32.info: Korean unique ship. Slow and ironclad. Strong vs. warships and buildings.

ud41.name: Thirisadai
ud41.info: Dravidian unique warship that fires multiple projectiles. Strong vs. warships.

ul1.name: Xolotl Warrior
ul1.info: Mesoamerican cavalry unit. Strong vs. infantry and siege. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

ul21.name: Shrivamsha Rider
ul21.info: Gurjara unique light cavalry unit which can dodge projectiles. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

ul22.name: Elite Shrivamsha Rider
ul22.info: Gurjara unique light cavalry unit which can dodge projectiles. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

uh1.name: Flemish Militia
uh1.info: Burgundian unique infantry unit. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. archers.

uy1.name: Missionary
uy1.info: Spanish unique mounted monk. Converts enemy units and heals friendly units. Faster than Monk but with less sight and range. Strong vs. slow, non-ranged units. Weak vs. Light Cavalry and ranged units. Cannot collect Relics.

y11.name: Monk
y11.info: Converts enemy units to your civilization. Heals friendly units (except ships and siege weapons). Strong vs. slow and non-ranged units. Weak vs. Light Cavalry and ranged units. Can collect Relics and bring them to Monasteries.

y12.name: Monk
y12.info: Converts enemy units to your civilization. Heals friendly units (except ships and siege weapons). Strong vs. slow and non-ranged units. Weak vs. Light Cavalry and ranged units. Can collect Relics and bring them to Monasteries.

y13.name: Monk
y13.info: Converts enemy units to your civilization. Heals friendly units (except ships and siege weapons). Strong vs. slow and non-ranged units. Weak vs. Light Cavalry and ranged units. Can collect Relics and bring them to Monasteries.

y14.name: Monk
y14.info: Converts enemy units to your civilization. Heals friendly units (except ships and siege weapons). Strong vs. slow and non-ranged units. Weak vs. Light Cavalry and ranged units. Can collect Relics and bring them to Monasteries.

zaztecs.name: Jaguar Warrior
zaztecs.info: Aztec unique infantry unit. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. cavalry and archers.

zbengalis.name: Ratha
zbengalis.info: Bengali unique chariot that can switch between melee and ranged attacks. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. Skirmishers and Camel Riders.

zberbers.name: Camel Archer
zberbers.info: Berber unique mounted archer. Strong vs. Cavalry Archers and infantry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Camel Riders.

zbohemians.name: Hussite Wagon
zbohemians.info: Bohemian unique siege unit. Units behind it receive 50% less damage from incoming projectiles. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. siege weapons.

zbritons.name: Longbowman
zbritons.info: British unique archer with very long range. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. cavalry and Skirmishers.

zbulgarians.name: Konnik
zbulgarians.info: Bulgarian unique cavalry unit that fights on as infantry when felled. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Camel Riders and Monks.

zburgundians.name: Coustillier
zburgundians.info: Burgundian unique cavalry unit which can charge its attack. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Camel Riders and Monks.

zburmese.name: Arambai
zburmese.info: Burmese unique cavalry archer with a powerful but inaccurate dart attack. Strong vs. infantry and cavalry. Weak vs. archers.

zbyzantines.name: Cataphract
zbyzantines.info: Byzantine unique cavalry unit. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers.

zcelts.name: Woad Raider
zcelts.info: Celtic unique infantry unit. Fast-moving. Strong vs. infantry and siege weapons. Weak vs. archers and cavalry.

zchinese.name: Chu Ko Nu
zchinese.info: Chinese unique archer with rapid-fire attack. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

zcumans.name: Kipchak
zcumans.info: Cuman unique cavalry archer with rapid-fire attack. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. Skirmishers.

zdravadians.name: Urumi Swordsman
zdravadians.info: Dravidian unique infantry unit which can charge its attack. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

zethiopians.name: Shotel Warrior
zethiopians.info: Ethiopian unique infantry with high attack and fast training speed. Fast-moving. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers.

zfranks.name: Throwing Axeman
zfranks.info: Frankish unique infantry unit with ranged melee attack. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

zgoths.name: Huskarl
zgoths.info: Gothic unique infantry unit with high pierce armor. Strong vs. archers and buildings. Weak vs. cavalry.

zgurjaras.name: Chakram Thrower
zgurjaras.info: Gurjara unique infantry unit with ranged melee attack. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

zhindustanis.name: Ghulam
zhindustanis.info: Hindustani unique infantry unit that thrusts its spear through multiple targets. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. cavalry.

zhuns.name: Tarkan
zhuns.info: Hunnic unique cavalry unit with attack bonus vs. buildings. Strong vs. buildings and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

zincas.name: Kamayuk
zincas.info: Inca unique spearman with increased attack range. Strong vs. cavalry and infantry. Weak vs. archers.

zitalians.name: Genoese Crossbowman
zitalians.info: Italian unique archer. Strong vs. cavalry and infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

zjapanese.name: Samurai
zjapanese.info: Japanese unique infantry unit with fast attack. Strong vs. unique units and infantry. Weak vs. archers.

zkhmer.name: Ballista Elephant
zkhmer.info: Khmer unique elephant equipped with a Scorpion. Can destroy trees. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. cavalry and siege weapons.

zkoreans.name: War Wagon
zkoreans.info: Korean unique cavalry archer unit. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Camel Riders.

zlithunanians.name: Leitis
zlithunanians.info: Lithuanian unique cavalry unit with attack that ignores armor. Strong vs. armored units.

zmagyars.name: Magyar Huszar
zmagyars.info: Magyar unique light cavalry unit. Strong vs. siege weapons. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

zmalay.name: Karambit Warrior
zmalay.info: Malay unique infantry unit. Cheap and only takes half a population unit. Strong in high numbers. Weak vs. cavalry and archers.

zmalians.name: Gbeto
zmalians.info: Malian unique infantry unit with ranged melee attack. Fast-moving. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

zmayans.name: Plumed Archer
zmayans.info: Mayan unique fast-moving archer. Strong vs. archers and infantry. Weak vs. cavalry.

zmongols.name: Mangudai
zmongols.info: Mongol unique cavalry archer with fast-firing attack. Strong vs. siege weapons and infantry. Weak vs. Skirmishers, Pikemen, and Camel Riders.

zpersians.name: War Elephant
zpersians.info: Persian unique unit. Slow and powerful cavalry. Strong vs. buildings and units at close range. Weak vs. Monks.

zpoles.name: Obuch
zpoles.info: Polish unique infantry unit which can damage the armor of units it is fighting. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

zportugese.name: Organ Gun
zportugese.info: Portuguese unique siege unit. Fires a volley of bullets. Strong vs. large groups of units. Weak vs. cavalry and Mangonels.

zsaracens.name: Mameluke
zsaracens.info: Saracen unique camel unit with ranged melee attack. Strong vs. cavalry. Weak vs. archers and Pikemen.

zsicilians.name: Serjeant
zsicilians.info: Sicilian unique infantry unit which can construct Donjons.

zslavs.name: Boyar
zslavs.info: Slavic unique cavalry unit. Resistant to melee attack.

zspanish.name: Conquistador
zspanish.info: Spanish unique mounted hand cannoneer. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Monks.

ztatars.name: Keshik
ztatars.info: Tatar unique cavalry unit that generates gold when fighting other units.

zteutons.name: Teutonic Knight
zteutons.info: Teutonic unique infantry unit. Slow and powerful. Strong vs. melee units. Weak vs. archers and Scorpions.

zturks.name: Janissary
zturks.info: Turkish unique hand cannoneer with longer range and no minimum range. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers.

zvietnamese.name: Rattan Archer
zvietnamese.info: Vietnamese unique archer with high pierce armor. Strong vs. archers and infantry. Weak vs. cavalry and Skirmishers.

zvikings.name: Berserk
zvikings.info: Viking unique infantry unit that slowly heals itself. Strong vs. infantry and siege weapons. Weak vs. archers.
